metadata.name: The Cometh Files - First Edition [Color]
metadata.description:
About the NFT:

This collaboration between Julien Hugonnard-Bert and Cometh is the first comic book page about the videogame universe. This unique and first comic book page celebrates the launch of the Polygon Galactic Grand Prix, the first large scale eSport tournament in the blockchain. The short story marks the beginning of a thrilling crypto space opera.

About the Artist:

Julien Hugonnard-Bert is a French illustrator and comic book artist. After spending a few years working as a mechanical engineer, he began his comics career inking books for Avatar Press, Dark Horse, DC and Marvel. His credits include X-Men, Crossed: Family Values, Star Wars and INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US YEAR TWO. He also continues to provide interior art, covers and illustrations to French and American editors for use in both publications and merchandising. He is currently working on Apollo and the Shades, his own crime comics series featuring a glam rock band, groupies, cops and murders.
